short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily save and share links you like with the PutCut extension!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PutCut.com is a website where you can share links you like with friends, or save them privately in your folder. To make saving links easier, we published the PutCut Chrome extension! 

Just install, click the button in the top right corner of the toolbar and you can save the current tab to any folder in your PutCut account!
